resources.string: BEGIN TRANSACTION; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Category ( category_id INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, name TEXT NOT NULL, discount INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(category_id AUTOINCREMENT) ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Product ( product_id INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, name TEXT NOT NULL, cream TEXT NOT NULL, flavour TEXT NOT NULL, unit_price INTEGER NOT NULL, image BLOB NULL, category_id INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(category_id) REFERENCES Category(category_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY(product_id AUTOINCREMENT) ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Orders ( orders_id INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, date TEXT NOT NULL, quantity INTEGER NOT NULL, status INTEGER NOT NULL, total_price NUMERIC NOT NULL, product_id INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(product_id) REFERENCES Product(product_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY(orders_id AUTOINCREMENT) ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS User ( user_id INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, name TEXT NULL, contact INTEGER NULL, image BLOB NULL, orders_id INTEGER NULL UNIQUE, auth_id INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, FOREIGN KEY(orders_id) REFERENCES Orders(orders_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY(auth_id) REFERENCES Auth(auth_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY(user_id AUTOINCREMENT) ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Auth ( auth_id INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, password TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, status INTEGER NOT NULL, admin INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(auth_id AUTOINCREMENT) ); COMMIT;
